name: 4 Meta World
description: 4MW is an ecological platform for the future of the metaverse. The whole system integrates the attributes of digital assets, DeFi, NFT, gaming and social networking. 4MW is the core token for the development and governance of the 4MW platform. The role of $4MW is to:Purchase NFTs and pay for games, Join Staking mining,Participate in DAO governance,Enjoy voting rights (to decide the direction of platform operations and launch games)
